title: Parenting Archives | Page 21 of 111
cleaned_text:
“No One Is Cleaning Their House Every Day. No One Is Having Sex Every Day. We Are All Losing Our Crap”: Exhausted Mom Paints...

“People always say to me, ‘I don’t know how you do it with 3. I can’t do it with 1.’ But through the tears, the poopy nappies, the first steps, you’re amazing. Don’t ever second guess it because those little turds, they never do. To them, you are wonderful. To them, you are everything."
